title.narrative: 2.2: QUALITY PRIMARY EDUCATION AND LEARNING OUTCOMES

description.narrative: Educational structures in priority regions have the tools and skills to implement quality education and monitor progress in learning outcomes for girls and boys aged 6 to 12 years.

mailing-address.narrative: BP 96 Niamakoro Route de l'Aeroport Bamako

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
Provision of multiple-levels (or alternative pathways of education) teacher training
Provision of primary education teacher training
Provision of training of other education staff excluding teachers (e.g. inspectors, district, ministry staff, etc.)
Provision of training of school communities e.g. parent teacher associations, school management committees
Provision or procurement of multiple-levels (or alternative pathways of education) learning materials
Provision or procurement of primary education learning materials
System strengthening - community participation and social accountability, e.g. school management committees
System strengthening - curricula and learning materials design (excluding early-learning / pre-primary)
System strengthening - gender-responsive teaching and learning (excluding SRGBV)
System strengthening - life skills (for personal empowerment, active citizenship, etc.)
System strengthening - teacher development, management, and support

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Educational structures in priority regions have the tools and skills to implement quality education and monitor progress in learning outcomes for girls and boys aged 6 to 12 years.
Number of primary schools with access to basic WASH services including Menstrual Hygiene Management in the reporting year only, with UNICEF direct support
System Strengthening - Learning assessment - Existence of a well-functioning classroom assessment system, including for early grades - score (1-4), see guidance
Service Delivery - Children provided with individual (one-per-child) education/early learning materials through UNICEF-supported programmes - see guidance
Number of girls and boys provided with individual education materials (primary school) through UNICEF-supported programmes (RAM Standard, KRC & SP Indicator)
Country has an effective education systems for learning outcomes, including early learning (Y/N)
